title: F/S: So. League T-206 cards in PSA 2

posts.post_title: F/S: So. League T-206 cards in PSA 2
posts.post_content:
For sale:

T206 - So. League card of George Paige in PSA 2 condition. Back is a Piedmont 350. SOLD

T206 - So. League card of Charles Seitz in PSA 2 condition. Back is a Piedmont 350. SOLD

See attached scans for further details on each card.

E-mail is [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url] for payment or if more scans are needed.

Thanks for looking.

Bill

Both So. League cards are now sold.

Thanks,

Bill
